name: csw21
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool word_tree.
Tool description: Given a set of letters, generate all the words that can be produced by adding at least one additional letter, arranged hierarchically.
API description: Search for words using the Collins Scrabble Words 2021 lexicon via the Word Tree API.

input.description: A series of at least 4 letters (a-z, case-insensitive). No other characters should be included or no meaningful results will be returned.
